GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of information about a specific article

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an object of information about a specific user

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for a specified article

GET /api/articles/:username.description: serves an object of information about a specific user

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the specified article's number of votes and serves the updated article object

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: updates the specified comment's number of votes and serves the updated comment object

exampleResponse.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: inserts a new comment to the database and serves the new comment object

DELETE /api/comments/comment_id.description: Deletes a specific comment from the database
